 2012-02902012-03-15,  ,  HRSDC,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to prescribe that the aggregate amount of outstanding Canada Student Loans may not exceed $19 billion and define the loans that are to be considered for these purposes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0041 Publication Date: 2012-03-28
